title: 110. The Life and Times of Cyrus and Ruth Jhabvala with Firoza Jhabvala
itunes:title: 110. The Life and Times of Cyrus and Ruth Jhabvala with Firoza Jhabvala
description: This week, we sit down with Firoza Jhabvala, musician and daughter of Cyrus and Ruth Jhabvala. We talk about growing up with two creative parents, the trans-disciplinarity of Cyrus' Jhabvala’s architecture practice, parallels with Vikram’s own father, Aditya Prakash, and the politics of colonial and post-colonial India.
